manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light Red Eyeshadow With soft light red eye shadow, can emphasize the eyes of the bright,clean and lovely. Purple Eyeshadow Purple has a sense of mystery, can increase the charming eyes.White skinned people are more suitable for painted purple eye shadow. Blue Eyeshadow Blue eye shadow can be used as decorative colors, and matching clothing tone. The blue eye shadow can be painted in the eyelid fold, it can also be inside the corner of the eye or outside the eye for a small amount of embellishment. Brown Eyeshadow Easy to coordinate with the skin color, and appears generous, natural. Fashion sense,brown eyeshadow are the commonly used colors. Gray Eyeshadow Gray eye shadow can emphasize or change the eye structure. Green Eyeshadow In a specific environment, the green eye shadow can give people a young, vibrant, full of fresh feeling. Suitable for coating in the eyelid fold or for a small area of ​​the point coating. Yellow Eyeshadow Can be used as a bright color to express the structure, or as a decorative color. Black Eyeshadow The popular smoky, using brown or gray colors before using black eye shadow as the base will have a better effect. The steps for using Ecvtop eyeshadow Dip light-colored eye shadow brushing the entire eyelid area. Dip a darker color eye shadow brushing the entire eye socket position and stretch a little from the end of eye. Dip an other darker eye shadow along the edge of the orbit, making the eyes more profound, dip light eye shadow modified eye brow and eye head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 4 and very interested in my makeup. This is a great kit for small hands. Range of colors was important to her and the eye shadows are highly pigmented.The scent isn’t irritating to her skin, but just to note that it has a noticeable perfume smell if that’s something you’re sensitive to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and perfect for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: This set is very good! I personally love the case. The eyeshadows are very highly pigmented and vibrant, they all mesh well together. I love the lipgloss and the tiny mirror too. I personally bought for traveling and I really don’t regret. =)

reviews.reviewerName: Very good, a little noisy.. have to use in the shower to decrease noise. Waterproof
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice colors
reviews.reviewText: Comes with everything you need including a mirror. Colors are very pigmented and bright. Item is a good quality for the price, definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift and much smaller than expected. It is okay but I wouldn’t buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This makeup set is smaller than it looks, poor quality packaging.
reviews.reviewText: This makeup set was smaller than it looked in the pictures, but it makes this palette easier to travel with. One of the blushes came cracked due to poor packaging. There is a piece of plastic over the eye shadows, to keep the rest of the palette neat, but I wish that there was plastic over the other side as well. The box that the makeup comes in lacks some information: There is a list of items that the set includes, and everything is listed except for the concealer. Also, they do not list the ingredients for the concealer, when all of the other product ingredients are included. The whole kit has a baby powder smell, which is noticeable when the set is open, but not when you are wearing the makeup (except for the lip gloss). The eye shadows are very pigmented, and very easy to apply. There is a brush/sponge tip applicator; the brush side is way too small to use for blush, so I would recommend using it for the eye shadow. The applicator is a better quality than I had thought, which was great! The lip glosses are not as bright as they look; they are quite transparent. The two blushes are very pigmented, so when applying them, I would suggest using a light hand. The concealer is definitely not the best; it sets much more transparent than it looks and much better ones exist, but it is still handy to have. The powder is good for setting the concealer, so I am glad that Evctop included it in the palette. Even with the messed up blush, I am happy to have this Evctop Professional Makeup Kit. I hope to use it when I travel, or to put in my purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who loves makeup. She loves it. Although I thought it was going to be medium size, it’s actually small. But worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my granddaughters. They love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light weight makeup & the colors are amazing... I wish they had more neutral & fall like colors.... I would definitely purchase them.
